> <OLD>
>
> nightlight shuddered in fear when she saw the Guards appear. "We ae gonne to
> die" she tought and her mind flew towards her daugher and who she believed
> is her husband.

<NEW>

As the door slid open SHARPEDGE was already firing his blaster at the
SHARKTICONS, one of them flying into the wall opposite the door and
the other was sent spinning.

STAMPY glanced back at NIGHTLIGHT and then the grenades sitting next
to the cylinder of glowing black energy turned to fire at the door, as
the normally fearful MAXIMAL blasted the last SHARKTICON to the floor.

"Come on!" STAMPY yelled. "We have to go, now!"

Alarms were blaring as STAMPY burst out of the room and SHARPEDGE
turned to urge NIGHTLIGHT.

(TAG)

- Preston
